reviewText: I've owned the VHS tape since the early 1990s and play it for students every year. This is a delightful performance! The singing isn't perfect, but the casting, staging, acting are excellent: i.e. the staging brings out the humor of the libretto and music beautifully. My only complaint is that it was never turned into a DVD.
In VHS format, this is a delightful opera with a well-designed story line, good music, costuming, sets, voices, and color.  Not to be missed.
